command.name: create

help.short: Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.
Name of the delivery rule which is unique within the endpoint.
Name of the rule set under the profile.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.actions" options="actions" group="Properties">
<help short="The set of query strings to be placed in the redirect URL. Setting this value would replace any existing query string; leave empty to preserve the incoming query string. Query string must be in = format. ? and & will be added automatically so do not include them."/>
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.actions[].UrlSigning.parameters.parameterNameOverride" options="parameter-name-override">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions" options="conditions" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].ClientPort.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].ClientPort.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].Cookies.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].Cookies.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].HostName.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].HostName.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].HttpVersion.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].HttpVersion.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].IsDevice.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].IsDevice.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].PostArgs.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].PostArgs.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].QueryString.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].QueryString.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RemoteAddress.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RemoteAddress.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestBody.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestBody.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestHeader.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestHeader.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestMethod.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestMethod.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestScheme.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestScheme.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestUri.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].RequestUri.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].ServerPort.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].ServerPort.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].SocketAddr.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].SocketAddr.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].SslProtocol.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].SslProtocol.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].UrlFileExtension.parameters.matchValues" options="match-values">
<arg type="array" var="$rule.properties.conditions[].UrlFileExtension.parameters.transforms" options="transforms">
